name: Robot Rampage (itch) (AveryRyan)
description:
Created by Team LARN, Robot Rampage is a top down space-shooter game demo reminiscent of the arcade shooters in the 80's. Created as an experiment to learn GameMaker, Team LARN attempted to use advanced mechanics such as timelines to run the game.

You play as a robot escaping from the mad scientist and have to get past the maniacal creations of the Evil Doctor.
